Visibility: 6.4 km

entry.title: Thursday: A few flurries. Temperature steady near minus 1.
entry.summary: Flurries. Local amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light early this afternoon. Temperature steady near minus 1. Wind chill near minus 7. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Thursday 26 January 2023
